This is a post with executable code.

간단한 시각화를 해봅시다

```{python}
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Example data
x = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
y = [10, 8, 6, 4, 2]

# Create scatter plot
plt.scatter(x, y)

# Add labels and title
plt.xlabel('X axis label')
plt.ylabel('Y axis label')
plt.title('Simple Scatter Plot')

# Show plot
plt.show()

```

Python과 R을 넘나들며 코딩이 가능합니다.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
a <- 5
b <- 10

library(ggplot2)
qplot(1:10)
```
